title: Project Cleanup - Warnings and Empty Files
details:
## Completed Project Cleanup (June 7, 2025)

### Fixed Warnings
- **Fixed CS9113 Warning**: Removed unused `logger` parameter from `MockAISummarizer` class in `VideoNoteProcessorDITests.cs`
  - Changed from primary constructor with unused parameter to parameterless class
  - Warning: `Parameter 'logger' is unread.`

### Removed Empty Files
Deleted the following empty test files that had 0 bytes:
- `NotebookAutomation.Core.Tests\MockKernel.cs`
- `NotebookAutomation.Core.Tests\OpenAiSummarizerTests.cs` 
- `NotebookAutomation.Core.Tests\VideoNoteProcessorShareLinkTests.cs`
- `NotebookAutomation.Core.Tests\Tools\Shared\DocumentNoteBatchProcessorReadOnlyTests.cs`
- `NotebookAutomation.Core.Tests\Tools\VideoProcessing\VideoMetadataFieldsTests.cs`

### Cleaned Up Directory Structure  
- Removed empty `Tools\Shared` directory after deleting the empty test file
- Ran `dotnet clean` to remove build artifacts and obj directories

### Enhanced XML Documentation
Added missing XML documentation to test methods in `MarkdownNoteProcessorTests.cs`:
- `ConvertToMarkdownAsync_HtmlFile_OnlyTags_ReturnsEmptyBody`
- `ConvertToMarkdownAsync_TxtFile_WithAISummary_ReturnsAISummary`  
- `ConvertToMarkdownAsync_EpubFile_Mocked_ReturnsMarkdown`

### Verification
- ✅ Build completed successfully with no warnings
- ✅ All 390 tests pass (388 succeeded, 2 skipped, 0 failed)
- ✅ No empty files remaining in the project
- ✅ GlobalUsings.cs optimization completed previously
- ✅ All test files have proper XML documentation

The codebase is now clean with no compiler warnings, no empty files, and comprehensive documentation.
